meanings.definition: To express deep sorrow or grief.
meanings.sent1: She begroans the loss of her beloved pet.
meanings.sent2: He begroans the passing of his dear friend.
meanings.sent3: The old man begroans the ache in his joints every morning.
meanings.sent4: The lonely tree begroans the harsh winds that bend its branches.
meanings.sent5: The haunting melody begroans the tragic tale of lost love.

meanings.definition: To lament or complain about something.
meanings.sent1: The customer begroans the poor service at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She begroans the long wait for the bus every day.
meanings.sent3: The child begroans having to eat his vegetables before dessert.
meanings.sent4: The student begroans the difficult assignment given by the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The cat begroans the lack of attention from its owner.
